title: Mouse Edge Scroll works, but can't click or use keyboard in game
body:
As the title says, I ahve been unable to interact with League once a game starts. I can not click or press keyboard shortcuts. When the mouse is brought to the edge the game will scroll however.

I have re-installed League, updated my GFX drivers. Any other suggestions?

I've been playing since season 2 first time I've experienced this

replies.body:
Oh that's pretty weird, and not a fun sudden issue to have.  I'm betting that your config settings might be messed up, but a reset might fix it.

#Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Give it a go and test it in a custom game, then let me know if it helped!
